title: WM69005: Geo Informatics Laboratory - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to geographic information system, coordinate systems, thematic mapping of water resources information, surface and subsurface database aggregation, terrain analysis using digital elevation models, watershed and river networks, flood plain mapping, hydroinformatic systems.
